data.title: Swift Current
data.meta_description: Success for your business begins at home, with folks who know the distant hum of the stock cars. The music of The Lyric. The roar in the stands at every Broncos game. The culture of the Southwest.  Success for your business begins at home, with folks who know branding, design, and strategy.From Shaunavon to Stewart […]
data.text:
Success for your business begins at home, with folks who know the distant hum of the stock cars. The music of The Lyric. The roar in the stands at every Broncos game. The culture of the Southwest.

Success for your business begins at home, with folks who know branding, design, and strategy.

From Shaunavon to Stewart Valley. Chinook, to Riverdene, to Memorial Park. Success for your business begins with Golden West and Homefield in Swift Current.

Affectionately nicknamed “Speedy Creek”, the City of Swift Current is the hub of Southwest Saskatchewan, set between Moose Jaw and Medicine Hat along the Trans-Canada Highway. Known for its legendary festival, Frontier Days in Kinetic Park, its many downtown storefronts and murals celebrate this history all year round!

Playing the newest country hits perfectly blended with classic favourites, CKSW 570 AM brings Swift Current locally-focused news, agricultural features, and inspirational programming.

Reaching everyone within 150 kilometres of Shaunavon, CJSN 1490 AM entertains with new and classic country, and informs with locally relevant news, weather, sports, agricultural reports, and inspirational programming.

The perfect mix of your favourite hits from the 70’s, 80’s, 90’s, and today is what attracts listeners to the Eagle 94.1 FM in Swift Current… and extensive local coverage of news, weather, and sports is what keeps them coming back.

Providing the best mix of music from the last 20 years with today’s top songs takes a magic touch – Magic 97.1 FM in Swift Current.

And, when the people of the Southwest want to be updated in an instant, they get all their hyper-local news and information with an easy click, at SwiftCurrentOnline.com.

Just like CKSW, CJSN, Magic, The Eagle, and Swift Current Online, Homefield Marketing and Homefield People + Strategy are part of Golden West. You can find them sharing space here in Swift Current, on the third floor of Innovation Centre (specifically, at 300 – 198 1st Ave NE). Giving the people of Southwest Saskatchewan local, in-person access to strategists who know how to get your message out there, and get your people rowing in the same direction.

Whether we’re sitting next to you at fundraisers of Broncos games, chatting with you on or over the radio, or meeting with you to see how we can help you propel your business forward – we ARE Golden West and Homefield, and we love meeting you in and around the community!

And we LOVE our community! Remember the Swift Current Radiothon for local healthcare? Together we saw Southwest Saskatchewan step up to raise $150,800 for the Dr. Noble Irwin Regional Healthcare Foundation! Because we’re all about everything that makes Southwest Sask a terrific place to live, work, and play.
